name: CubeRunner (Beta) (The HugoVerse)
description:
CubeRunner is more than just a 3D platformer puzzle game. It's an experience.  The goal to beating it is a can-do attitude. You must try and try again until something works.

(note: this is a beta version for anyone who wants to test it out for themselves. Please write any notes regarding the game and I'll send them your way)

Types of Cubes

If it's white it's alright

If it's red you're dead

If it's blue you got through

If it's green gravity is mean

If it's purple you'll go...burple (I can't think of a rhyme you just jump higher)

If it's cyan checkpointing is the plan

If it's yellow you won't jump like jell-o

If it's orange speed isn't borange?

If it's gold teleportation? I'm sold!
